always @(posedge req_clk)
begin
  if (state == STATE_ZERO_COMPL) begin
    measured_burst_length <= {BYTES_PER_BURST_WIDTH{1'b1}};
  end else if (state == STATE_ACC) begin
    measured_burst_length <= req_response_dest_data_burst_length;
  end
end
